channel.title: Data Visualization in D3 on Hello there!
channel.description: Recent content in Data Visualization in D3 on Hello there!

item.title: Grouped bar chart of flight cancellation in d3js
item.description: setwd("~/Desktop/hugo/blogdown-hugo/content/post") h3 { color: gray; font-size: 20px; font-weight: bold; font-family: Georgia; text-align: center; } .gtitle { background: white; height: 100px; overflow: hidden; position: relative; width: 100%; } .gtitle h3 { animation: slideUp 0.75s 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.17, 0.88, 0.32, 1.27) both, fadeIn 0.25s 0.5s ease-in both; padding: 0 20px; position: absolute; text-align: center; text-shadow: 2px 2px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25); top: 25%; width: 100%; } @keyframes slideUp { from { transform: translateY(-200%); } to { transform: translateY(-50%); } } @keyframes fadeIn { from { opacity: 0; } to { opacity: 1; } } .
